Welcome_

I've collected the majority of projects and other assignments I did in COMP 250 below. There's short writeups on some of the more interesting ones, and some code samples where helpful. I hope you find something useful. Keep in mind that some of the projects dealing with PHP will break over time as changes are made to the server.

The source code for all of this can be found on GitHub.

Color Tools – and their importance

Twister – using PHP & mySQL

Movie Search – AJAX & API Introduction

Sharing grund.css – a classless CSS template

Courses Database – PHP & mySQL

PHP Practice – understanding Cookies and Sessions

Survey Forms & Processing – an introduction to PHP

Door Prizes – I did this project wrong but the CSS is nice

Tic Tac Toe – Javascript practice

Temperature Converter

Grade Distribution – using JS libraries
